mainText: 'This should be for emails sent after the tweet, plz give it another shot!'
'We're rolling more changes to make sure that verification emails last the full 24h, please let us know if you still run into issues :)'

summary: Simon, re: KC sharing Hytale google trends are higher than trailer release (2018)

mainText: 'Did you already have an account prior, what sign in method did you use? We're trying to narrow this issue down.'

summary: Simon, re: virtual currency for Hytale
mainText: 'No virtual currency planned for now, just boilerplate wording atm to get ready asap.'

summary: Buddha, re: ExodusAblaze being at work instead of Flash
mainText: 'Exo making the sacrifice for Flash ðŸ’š'

summary: Buddha, re: user thanking the team

mainText: 'No, you only need access to the old account to receive the token. You can then use it on your Hytale account.'
'The name reservation emails are completely separate from the accounts system, no need to change anything.'

'Seeing a massive number of account creations over the past few hours! That being said, please be patient if you are having issues making an account or receiving a verification email. We are being throttled a bit due to the sheer amount of signups. Very surprising to see that many people are still interested in Hytale, inspiring journey ahead!

The actual username reservation won't start today. It will begin rolling out this week, and then on Saturday (Dec 13th) for pre-orders if you're not on the mailing list, allowing you to secure your username as well.

We have reserved many known creators' names in preparation to avoid impersonation, and we have a mechanism in place to prevent anyone from squatting your username if you are a known creator. More info will follow this week. 
Speaking of which, the Support a Creator rev share program is ready and will be deployed in the coming days for application.

I want everyone to please remember, once again, that this will be a true early access experience. We got the game 3 weeks ago, and we are using an old build from 4 years ago. We have big plans for the future, and we are more than honoured to see you all supporting us!'
